Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a device that uses string or sound waves to connect the two people and allows them to send or receive information.
The student can use only simple materials in the drawing, such as string and paper cups, to show how the device is built.
The student can label the parts of the device in their drawing that help it send or receive sound.
The student can explain through labels, if necessary, how the device works to help the two people communicate.
